Hello Mike, Ken

Is my error during the write of=
 genome relate parity example
the correct genome is :

 genomestart  1
 tra=
it 1 0.1 0 0 0 0 0 0 0
 trait 2 0.2 0 0 0 0 0 0 0
 trait 3 0.3 0 0 0 0 0 0 =
0
 node 1 0 1 1
 node 2 0 1 1
 node 3 0 1 1
 node 4 0 1 3
 node 5 0 0 2

ne 1 1 5 0.0 0 1 0 1
 gene 2 2 5 0.0 0 2 0 1
 gene 3 3 5 0.0 0 3 0 1
 gene =
1 4 5 0.0 0 4 0 1
 genomeend 1

As has write the Doctor Ken the fields of g=
ene are :
  'gene'     (ignored)
  trait-id
  inp node
  out node
  weight
=
  flag for recursion  
  innovation number
  mutation value
  flag for enab=
le or not of gene

Again , please the error

ciao
